abstract: The judge in the Washington Mutual bankruptcy case is postponing a hearing as the bank tries to resolve disputes with JPMorgan Chase and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
snippet: The judge in the Washington Mutual bankruptcy case is postponing a hearing as the bank tries to resolve disputes with JPMorgan Chase and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the Washington Mutual bankruptcy case is postponing a hearing as the bank tries to resolve disputes with JPMorgan Chase and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: WaMu Bankruptcy Hearing Delayed as Talks Go On
